pullRequest.title: Support RSA-PSS Signature scheme
pullRequest.bodyText:
Provide support for the various SHAxxxwithRSAPSS algorithms, including
SHA-256, SHA-384, and SHA-512 variants.
Authored by Jack Magne; revised patch forwarded ported from v4.4.x by
Alexander Scheel.
Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

nodes.bodyText:
@jmagne While this is still fresh, do you have better descriptions here? I'm not sure I've fully grasped this DER decoding business here and its relevance.
This applies to lines 148 also.
@jmagne Why do we fallback to SHA1 here? Is there a relevant portion of the spec somewhere?
When ctx == NULL and we're in an error case from getRSAPSSParamsAndSigningAlg, we leak arena, meaning signAlg gets leaked.
